brokers.name: Acxiom
brokers.verification_steps: Scroll to “Consumer Opt Out Form” and submit; follow on-screen verification if prompted.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: If no response after 30 days, resubmit the request.

brokers.name: Spokeo
brokers.verification_steps: Paste your profile URL and submit; verify via email if prompted.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: Recheck your listing after a few days; resubmit if needed.

brokers.name: Whitepages
brokers.verification_steps: Paste your profile URL and complete verification (may require phone or email).
brokers.follow_up_guidance: Recheck your listing after a few days; resubmit if needed.

brokers.name: BeenVerified
brokers.verification_steps: Search for your listing and verify via email.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: Recheck your listing after a few days; resubmit if needed.

brokers.name: Intelius (PeopleConnect)
brokers.verification_steps: Use the PeopleConnect suppression tool and verify via email.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: If your record persists, repeat suppression after 30 days.

brokers.name: PeopleFinders
brokers.verification_steps: Submit the opt-out form and verify via email if prompted.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: Recheck your listing after a few days; resubmit if needed.

brokers.name: TruthFinder
brokers.verification_steps: Use the PeopleConnect suppression tool and verify via email.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: If your record persists, repeat suppression after 30 days.

brokers.name: MyLife
brokers.follow_up_guidance: If no response after 30 days, resubmit.

brokers.name: LexisNexis
brokers.follow_up_guidance: If no response after 30 days, resubmit or contact LexisNexis support.

brokers.name: Radaris
brokers.verification_steps: Find your profile and click “Remove my information.”
brokers.response_time: Varies; check listing after a few days.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: Repeat removal if the listing reappears.

brokers.name: ZoomInfo
brokers.verification_steps: Submit the Privacy Center opt-out request.
brokers.follow_up_guidance: Follow up after 30 days if still listed.
